content: this legal text explains the division of assets among three parties in a property located in municipality castelfidardo the property includes various types of spaces such as dwelling rooms apartments warehouses laboratories garages and rooftop terraces the total value of the assets is €237012 the parties have agreed to divide the assets into three shares each party will receive specific properties and a portion of the money obtained from the sale of the inherited assets cm will receive a real estate unit and €163866 cf will receive various real estate units and €174267 and cg will receive the remaining sum of money the parties confirm that the assigned shares correspond to their entitlement and waive any legal mortgage
